squirt.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if you squirt liquid or if it squirts somewhere, it is forced out in a thin fast stream
squirt.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Water suddenly squirted out from a hole in the pipe.
Squirt some oil in the lock.
squirt.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to hit or cover someone or something with a thin fast stream of liquid
squirt.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Some kids squirted a water pistol in her face.
Mom! Chadâ€™s squirting me with the hose!
squirt.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a fast thin stream of liquid
squirt.translation[1].definitions[1].def: an insulting word for a short person, especially someone who is annoying you
